CustomField.description: Uses the account record type to determine the User ID that the account should be transferred to if the account is rejected.
CustomField.formula: IF( Account__r.RecordTypeId="0121P000000oQVg", "0051P000003IOMR", IF( CONTAINS(ADR_Role_Copy__c, 'Sites'), Account__r.OwnerId, IF( OR( CONTAINS(AE_Role_Copy_at_Transfer__c,"ENT"), AND( CONTAINS(AE_Role_Copy_at_Transfer__c,"AE3"), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Account__r.Inside_Sales_Assignment__c))=FALSE, Account__r.Number_of_Vehicles__c>175, ADR_Segment_Alignment_at_Transfer__c="AE3" ) ) ), IF( ISBLANK(AE_Demo_Transfer_To__r.ADR_Assignment__c), ADR_Transfer_By__r.Id, AE_Demo_Transfer_To__r.ADR_Assignment_User_ID__c ), IF( Account__r.RecordTypeId="0121a000000VnAp", "0051a000002lwW3", IF( ISBLANK(Account__r.Original_Owner_for_Recycling_Campaign__c), "0051a000002W9In", Account__r.Original_Owner_for_Recycling_Campaign__c ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Rejected Account Owner
